title: Schedule Release and You're the GM!
itunes:title: Schedule Release and You're the GM!
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal & Chris Wesseling give you all of the latest news around the NFL including Brandon Marshall being cut by the New York Giants (04:39), Dwight Freeney retiring (07:17), and the Ravens, New Orleans, and the battle for Willy Snead. (10:43). The heroes also discuss the schedule release and the opening game Eagles v Falcons. (14:26). Lastly, they close out the show with a hilarious episode of “You’re the GM!” that you just can’t afford to miss. (25:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
